home.title: JyBr - Just Your Brain Report
home.subtitle: Explore your mind and brain through various tests ‚ú®

about.title: Welcome to Our Psychological Testing Platform
about.description1: JYBR (Just Your Brain Report) is a platform that enables deep exploration of your personality, thought patterns, and inner characteristics through scientific and reliable psychological tests. We provide accurate and useful analysis based on the latest research in psychology and neuroscience.
about.description2: Each test is designed based on professional psychological theories and provides insights that help with self-understanding and growth by analyzing individual tendencies from multiple angles. We comprehensively cover various areas from personality types to cognitive abilities and emotional patterns.
about.description3: All test results prioritize privacy protection and are processed anonymously. Through the results, we help you better understand yourself and make better choices in daily life and relationships.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1: Accurate psychological analysis based on scientific evidence
features.feature4: Multilingual support for barrier-free testing experience

personality.title: Personality Tests
personality.description: Comprehensively analyze personality types and hormonal tendencies (estrogen/testosterone) to deeply explore your true personality and behavioral patterns. Provides a scientific approach to understanding individual characteristics from multiple angles.

horror.title: Horror Tests
horror.description: Analyze your deep psychological state and unconscious patterns through reactions to psychological horror elements and thriller situations. Discover your hidden self through exciting scenarios.

intelligence.title: Intelligence Tests
intelligence.description: Systematically evaluate logical thinking, pattern recognition, and problem-solving abilities to measure cognitive capabilities across various domains. Confirm intellectual capacity through objective and scientific methods.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 JYBR - Just Your Brain Report. All rights reserved.
footer.description: Understand yourself more deeply with scientific and reliable psychological analysis.

personalityET.title: Personality Type + EgenTeto Comprehensive Test
personalityET.overview: Comprehensively analyze personality types and hormonal tendencies (estrogen/testosterone) to deeply explore your true personality and behavioral patterns. Provides a scientific approach to understanding individual characteristics from multiple angles.
features: Comprehensive evaluation combining personality type analysis and estrogen/testosterone tendencies
Reliable results based on scientific evidence
Understanding individual behavioral patterns and thinking styles
Analysis of characteristics in interpersonal relationships and decision-making
methods: Review detailed analysis combining both results
Receive personalized advice and improvement plans

psychopath.title: Psychopath Tendency Test
psychopath.overview: A test to measure psychopathic tendencies based on psychological research. This test is created for entertainment purposes and does not replace medical diagnosis. Please use it as a tool to understand your personality characteristics.
methods: Choose honest reactions to each situation
Prioritize immediate feelings over emotional reactions
psychopath.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This test is for entertainment purposes and does not replace professional psychological evaluation.

iq.title: IQ Test
iq.overview: An intelligence quotient test that comprehensively measures logical thinking, pattern recognition, and problem-solving abilities. Provides objective and reliable results through standardized questions and evaluates cognitive abilities across various domains in a balanced manner.
areas: Spatial perception and visual pattern recognition
Working memory and information processing speed
methods: Concentrate and respond in a quiet environment
Do your best to solve problems within time limits
Complete all questions and check results
iq.tip: üí° Tip: Trust your first instinct and don't overthink.
